description: [center]'Summon the enchanted state Q1 into your mystical DFA. Bind it to others with transition spells and imbue it with traits using magical effects.'[/center]

[center]'Summon the enchanted state Q15 into your mystical DFA. Bind it to others with transition spells and imbue it with traits using magical effects.'[/center]
[center]'Cast a spell of choice! This transition lets your DFA journey upon either path A or B. Perfect for crafting versatile connections or loops.'[/center]
[center]'Invoke a dual path of power! This transition requires both A and B to activate, binding states with a pact of duality.'[/center]
[center]'Crown a state as the genesis of your DFA’s magic. The journey begins here, where all spells take form.'[/center]
[center]'Bestow a state with the blessing of completion. This final state marks the triumph of your DFA’s enchanted quest.'[/center]
